title: Amy’s Son Gets Punished For Being Disrespectful + Haley Stevens Talks About Getting Ghosted By Her Bachelorette Contestant Boyfriend
itunes:title: Amy’s Son Gets Punished For Being Disrespectful + Haley Stevens Talks About Getting Ghosted By Her Bachelorette Contestant Boyfriend
description:
Amy opens up about having to discipline her son after he was disrespectful. Also, musician Haley Stevens stops by to talk about getting ghosted by her boyfriend Jed Wyatt after he went on The Bachelorette.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
